languages.text: {n}Змей равнодушно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Это что же выходит, я — негодяй, который тебя обманул? Шокирующее понимание".
{n}Malice shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. Does that make me a scoundrel, then? A liar? I stand in awe of your perceptiveness."
languages.original_text: {n}Змей равнодушно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Это что же выходит, я — негодяй, который тебя обманул? Шокирующее понимание".

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. So it makes me a scoundrel, then? Someone who tells lies? I am appalled."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}マリスは無関心に肩をすくめる。{/n}「なるほどな。つまり、俺は悪党ということか？嘘つきの？まったく、敬服すべき洞察力だな」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. Does that make me a scoundrel, then? A liar? I stand in awe of your perceptiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスは無関心に肩をすくめる。{/n}「なるほどな。つまり、俺は悪党ということか？嘘つきの？まったく、敬服すべき洞察力だな」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}恶棍无动于衷地耸了耸肩。{/n}“当然了。怎么，我听起来像个骗子，像个恶棍吗？呵，你的观察能力真是让我心服口服。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. Does that make me a scoundrel, then? A liar? I stand in awe of your perceptiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇人无动于衷地耸了耸肩。{/n}“当然了。怎么，我听起来像个骗子，像个恶棍吗？呵，这可真让我惊讶。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Malicia se encoge, indiferente.{/n} «No me digas. Entonces, ¿me estás llamando un rufián? ¿Un mentiroso? Tus dotes de percepción son francamente asombrosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. Does that make me a scoundrel, then? A liar? I stand in awe of your perceptiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}La víbora se encoge de hombros con indiferencia.{/n} «No me digas. Entonces, ¿eso me convierte en un sinvergüenza? ¿En un mentiroso? Estoy muy ofendido».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Tücke zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Was Ihr nicht sagt. Macht mich das zu einem Schurken? Einem Lügner? Ich erstarre in Ehrfurcht vor Eurem Wahrnehmungsvermögen."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. Does that make me a scoundrel, then? A liar? I stand in awe of your perceptiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Schlange zuckt gleichgültig mit den Achseln.{/n} "Was Ihr nicht sagt. Das macht mich also zu einem Schuft? Zu einem Lügner? Ich bin entsetzt."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Malice hausse les épaules avec indifférence.{/n} « Non, vraiment ? Du coup, je suis quoi, une crapule ? Un menteur ? Vous êtes d'une perspicacité impressionnante. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. Does that make me a scoundrel, then? A liar? I stand in awe of your perceptiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malice hausse les épaules avec indifférence.{/n} « Non, vraiment ? Du coup, je suis quoi, une crapule ? Un menteur ? Vous êtes d'une perspicacité impressionnante. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Melanet, kayıtsızca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Gerçekten mi? O zaman hainin teki miyim ben? Yalancı mıyım yoksa? Anlama kabiliyetine gerçekten hayran kaldım."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice shrugs indifferently.{/n} "You don't say. Does that make me a scoundrel, then? A liar? I stand in awe of your perceptiveness."
